name: Pharaohs Tomb
description:
A 2D/3D Vertical Puzzle Platformer where you have to go as deep into the tomb as you can before the time runs out.

WASD - Move Ball

Arrow Keys - Turn Pillar

I made this Game for Ludum Dare 48 in 72 hours, if you also took part in LD48 here's a link to the site https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/pharoahs-tomb
